text: A print of Balon depicted as a harlequin or jester Claude Balon (also Ballon, often incorrectly named Jean; 1671–1744) was a French dancer and choreographer. The ballet term ballon is sometimes said to be derived from his name, but Robert Greskovic calls this "dubious".Robert Greskovic. Ballet 101, 2005. Balon danced under the tutelage of the balletmaster Pierre Beauchamp at the Paris Opera.
